plays.text: 2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Mike Ribeiro
Penalty to Stephane Quintal 2 minutes for High Sticking Shayne Corson
Goal scored by Mats Sundin assisted by Alexander Mogilny and Nikolai Antropov
Penalty to Andrei Markov 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Bryan McCabe
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Tripping Andrei Markov
Goal scored by Mats Sundin assisted by Mikael Renberg
Goal scored by Jyrki Lumme assisted by Alexander Mogilny and Nikolai Antropov
Penalty to Robert Svehla 2 minutes for Elbowing Doug Gilmour
Penalty to Richard Zednik 2 minutes for Crosschecking Bryan McCabe
Penalty to Doug Gilmour 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified) served by Oleg Petrov
Penalty to Doug Gilmour 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Darcy Tucker 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Richard Zednik
Penalty to Robert Reichel 2 minutes for Slashing Richard Zednik
Penalty to Shayne Corson 2 minutes for Hooking Karl Dykhuis
Penalty to Jonas Hoglund 2 minutes for Roughing Oleg Petrov
Goal scored by Jan Bulis unassisted
